script.source: def results = [:];for (def retrieverResult : inputs) {    int index = retrieverResult.size();    for (ScriptRankDoc scriptRankDoc : retrieverResult) {        ScoreDoc scoreDoc = scriptRankDoc.scoreDoc();        results.compute(                new RankKey(scoreDoc.doc, scoreDoc.shardIndex),                (key, value) -> {                    def v = value;                    if (v == null) {                        v = new ScoreDoc(scoreDoc.doc, 0f, scoreDoc.shardIndex);                    }                    v.score += 1.0f / (60 + index);                    return v;                }        );        --index;    }}def output = new ArrayList(results.values());output.sort((ScoreDoc sd1, ScoreDoc sd2) -> { return sd1.score < sd2.score ? 1 : -1; });return output;
